## **WMSC Driver’s Education**



Wyoming Montana Safety Council offers Driver’s Education taught by Tim
Woodard, former Laramie County School District Driver’s Ed Instructor. Classes
during the school-year are 4 days per week and last three weeks (the last
session of the school year will be 3 days per week and last for 4 weeks). All
class times are 4:30pm pm to 7:00pm. During the summer sessions, students may
choose from two-week classes in the morning from 7:30 am  to 11:30 am, or
afternoon from 12:00 pm to 4:00 pm. Please see session details when you click
on the Register button below. Students will be driving in a 2018 Ford
EchoSport and a 2017 Ford Focus equipped with an instructor’s brake for safety
purposes. You may choose either Classroom + Driving for $310 or Classroom Only
for $175.





### **Defensive Driving**
